data.name: Safari Ball
data.summary: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon in the Great Marsh or Safari Zone.  Success rate is 1.5×.
data.description:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1.5×.

This item can only be used in the []{location:great-marsh} or []{location:kanto-safari-zone}.
